20101228073813.000|20101228073815.000|CC1|MOVED TO NEW YORK WHEN I WAS 19 
20101228073815.000|20101228073817.000|CC1|AND I'M 30 NOW, BUT, LIKE I WENT

20101228073832.000|20101228073833.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, THANK YOU.

20101228081757.000|20101228081802.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20101228081802.000|20101228081804.000|CC1|>> HEY, JAY, HOW YOU DOING.     
20101228081804.000|20101228081805.000|CC1|GREAT THAT YOU'RE HERE IN       
20101228081805.000|20101228081805.000|CC1|BROOKLYN.                       
20101228081805.000|20101228081807.000|CC1|I'VE LIVED HERE ALL MY LIFE.    
20101228081807.000|20101228081808.000|CC1|I REMEMBER WHEN I WAS LIKE NINE 
20101228081808.000|20101228081810.000|CC1|YEARS OLD WHEN "HARD KNOCK LIFE"
20101228081810.000|20101228081812.000|CC1|CAME OUT,ED THAT CASSETTE TAPE. 
20101228081812.000|20101228081813.000|CC1|DIDN'T KNOW WHAT YOU WERE       
20101228081813.000|20101228081814.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT BACK THEN.

20101228081819.000|20101228081823.000|CC1|I HAVE THIS QUESTION.           
20101228081823.000|20101228081827.000|CC1|IN THE GRAMMY FREE STYLE AND    
20101228081827.000|20101228081828.000|CC1|YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT SUCCESS AND
20101228081828.000|20101228081832.000|CC1|OUTCOME AND EVERYTHING, WHAT WAS
20101228081832.000|20101228081833.000|CC1|GOING ON WITH YOU AT THAT TIME? 
20101228081833.000|20101228081835.000|CC1|WHAT POSSESSED YOU TO TALK ABOUT
20101228081835.000|20101228081835.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101228081835.000|20101228081837.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT'S KIND OF DARK, LIKE 
20101228081837.000|20101228081838.000|CC1|THE MATERIAL YOU'RE TALKING

20101228081840.000|20101228081842.000|CC1|ABOUT THAT AT THAT MOMENT?      
20101228081842.000|20101228081845.000|CC1|>> INSPIRED BY MY CHAR YOT... SO
20101228081845.000|20101228081850.000|CC1|I WAS IN MY HOUSE AND I HAD THIS
20101228081850.000|20101228081853.000|CC1|BOSCIOT... THAT WAS ONE IS A    
20101228081853.000|20101228081855.000|CC1|PRINT OF BAS KUWAIT PAINTING    
20101228081855.000|20101228081856.000|CC1|CALLED CHARLES III.             
20101228081856.000|20101228081859.000|CC1|AND ON THE BOTTOM IT MOST YOUNG 
20101228081859.000|20101228081901.000|CC1|KINGS GET THEIR HEAD CUT OFF AND
20101228081901.000|20101228081903.000|CC1|IT HAD "YOUNG" COTSZED OUT.     
20101228081903.000|20101228081906.000|CC1|BECAUSE KUWAIT.

20101228081908.000|20101228081910.000|CC1|WHILE AND I SAID MAN, THAT'S    
20101228081910.000|20101228081921.000|CC1|SORT OF MORBID.                 
20101228081921.000|20101228081922.000|CC1|AND THOSE REAL OPENING LINES WAS
20101228081922.000|20101228081925.000|CC1|TRUE, INSPIRED BY BASQUIAT.     
20101228081925.000|20101228081927.000|CC1|AND THAT'S HOW HE PAINTED.      
20101228081927.000|20101228081929.000|CC1|MOST OF THE MEN IN HIS PAINTINGS
20101228081929.000|20101228081933.000|CC1|BEING BROUGHT TO BE GROWN MEN,
